name: Eviction Defense Collaborative
description: Free eviction defense and legal help for San Francisco tenants
fullDescription: The Eviction Defense Collaborative provides free legal help to San Francisco tenants facing eviction, offering same-day assistance at the courthouse.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free legal consultations for tenants facing eviction
- Same-day help at SF Superior Court
- Help responding to unlawful detainer lawsuits
- Negotiation with landlords
- Full representation in some cases
- Tenant rights education
howToGetIt:
1. Visit the EDC office at SF Superior Court (Civic Center Courthouse)
2. Or call for an appointment
3. Bring your eviction notice and any court papers
4. Available to all SF tenants regardless of income
5. Walk-in clinic hours available
keywords: eviction defense, San Francisco, tenant, unlawful detainer, housing court, free lawyer, renter, landlord, eviction notice, EDC
